title: Naze Ka Tsukai Ma No Usagi Wa Boku Wo Dekiai Shisugiteru
alternative_title: なぜか使い魔のウサギは僕を溺愛しすぎてる ; For Some Reason, My Rabbit Familiar is Madly in Love with Me
status: なぜか使い魔のウサギは僕を溺愛しすぎてる ; For Some Reason, My Rabbit Familiar is Madly in Love with Me
description:
Description :
        Aidan McGuire is a new magician in the ‘Guardians of the Order’. Every Guardian has a humanoid familiar, and summoning one is mandatory! But during the summoning ceremony, Aidan summons a cute rabbit! He was told ‘deeper contact’ was necessary for the familiar to showcase its true power… so when he tried kissing it, the rabbit disappeared and a young man named ‘Jougasaki Hidetora’ appeared in its place! A cute (?!) fantasy BL story about a magician with a vague memory of some other life.
